name: 蔡福裕
objective: 本課程旨在教導學生具備獨立思考有機化學的能力;因此課程分為基本觀念(結構式與鍵結),有機化學反應與反應機構以及化合物的製備與分析等三大部分。
schedule:
1. 授課大綱及考試評分規定
2. Naming Compounds with a Functional Group That Calls for a Suffix 1
3-4. Antroduction to Multistep Mechanisms
5-6. Nucleophilic Substitution and Elimination Reaction 1
7.第一次考試
8.  Naming Compounds with a Functional Group That Calls for a Suffix 2
9-10.Nucleophilic Substitution and Elimination Reaction 2
11-12. Electrophilic Addition to Nonpolar pi Bonds 1
13.第二次考試
14-15. Electrophilic Addition to Nonpolar pi Bonds 2
16-17.Structure Determination
18. 期末考
materials:
Organic Chemistry
Principles and Mechanisms
Joel Karty
2nd Ed.
